<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Cruelty](/Feats.aspx?ID=5896) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Champion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=811" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 95 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Prerequisites**
[_touch of the void_](/Spells.aspx?ID=2048)

</column>

---

The harm you deal with your corrupting touch saps the strength from your enemy's body. You can cast [_touch of the void_](/Spells.aspx?ID=2048) targeting a living creature using 2 actions instead of 1. If you do, the target is also [enfeebled 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=71) for 1 minute if it fails its save (enfeebled 2 if it critically fails).

<title level="2">Cruelty leads to...</title>
[Greater Cruelty](/Feats.aspx?ID=5903)
name: Cruelty
